children.subject: You should try applying to things through URAP: https://urap.berkeley.edu

history.content: This upcoming semester will be my 3rd semester and I’m wondering if its worth a shot to apply for research assistant positions. When would be an appropraite time to apply for these positions? Relevent courses ive taken are 61a,b math1a and 1b. Ill be taking math 53, cs70 and ee16a this semester. Any useful insights or tips would be appreciated! Does the topic of research matter that much or should I only be applying to things I'd like to go to grad school for? Thanks
history.subject: research as a sophmore?
